methods.name: getToolTemplate
methods.comment: Get the tool template for the given tool name.

return.comment:
null if there is no tool template for the given
 toolName.

methods.name: getToolTemplates
methods.comment: Get the ToolConfigs from the tool chest.

return.comment:
zero-length array if there are no ToolConfigs in the
 tool chest.

methods.javadoc:
Remove tool template from the tool chest.
@return true if the template was removed from the tool chest.
methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove tool template from the tool chest.

return.comment: true if the template was removed from the tool chest.

methods.javadoc: Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment:
Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the
 toString method returns a string that
 "textually represents" this object. The result should
 be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a
 person to read.
